quote: If we do not know what future the present is leading us toward, how can we say whether this present is good or bad, whether it deserves our concurrence, or our suspicion, or our hatred?
quote_letters: IF WE DO NOT KNOW WHAT FUTURE THE PRESENT IS LEADING US TOWARD HOW CAN WE SAY WHETHER THIS PRESENT IS GOOD OR BAD WHETHER IT DESERVES OUR CONCURRENCE OR OUR SUSPICION OR OUR HATRED
